mapper.insert: insert into books (book_id, bookName, price, pub_id) values (${bookId}, #{bookName}, ${price}, ${pubId})
mapper.select: select book_id bookId, bookName bookName, price, pub_id pubId from books
SELECT book_id bookId, bookName bookName, price, pub_id pubId FROM books WHERE book_id like ${bookId}
SELECT book_id bookId, bookName bookName, price, pub_id pubId FROM books WHERE pub_id like ${pubId}
SELECT book_id bookId, bookName bookName, price, pub_id pubId FROM books where bookName like '%' || #{value} || '%'
select book_id bookId, bookName bookName, price, pub_id pubId from books where price >= ${price}
mapper.delete: delete from books where book_id like ${bookId}
